long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NOW WITH KICK 2.0 SITE SUPPORT.

From site tweaks to custom emotes(via AeroKick or 7tv), in-chat reactions, an advanced chat bot and SO much more, AeroKick offers every feature you could possibly want.

Oh, and every single thing it adds can be toggled, tweaked, and changed to work exactly how you want it to.

Overview:

- A fully redesigned chat system, offering tons of new customization options, chat avatars, reactions, and much more

- A full custom emote system allowing channel owners to add up to 500 custom emotes to their channel, and for AeroKick Dynamic members, a "personal" emote system allowing you to take up to 3 emotes with you, anywhere on Kick.

- A custom badge system within AeroKick that offers tons of unlockable badges that can be unlocked by taking various actions, like uploading your first emote, winning a game, etc. With new badges being added all the time!

- A robust achievement system allowing you to unlock Badges, Gradients, and avatar frames by taking actions across AeroKick and Kick itself.

- TONS of site tweaks, everything from changes to the way the sidebar works, abilities to tweak colors, new buttons, and more.

- A re-imagined channel search system, allowing you to search in real-time by title, category, name, even channel bios!

- A BUNCH of accessibility tweaks, including the ability to change font sizes, disable animated emotes, change chat colors, with more planned soon!

- An audio normalization system offering real-time audio normalization to any stream you're watching

- New sounds and tab effects when you are mentioned in chat.

- So much more, download it today and try everything out! 

If you ever run into any issues, you can contact us via our discord: https://aro.so/discord and we'll get everything fixed up as fast as possible!
